A consultant is discussing the benefits of Data Cloud with a customer that has multiple disjointed data sources.
Which two functional areas should the consultant highlight in relation to managing customer data? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AB
"unified profiles" represent a single, consolidated view of a customer created by combining data from various sources across different systems, while "data harmonization" refers to the process of standardizing and unifying this data to create those unified profiles, essentially ensuring a consistent and actionable data set across the platform

Selected Answer: B
a collection of customer information that a company has gathered directly from its users through their interactions with the brand, stored securely within a cloud-based data platform, where the data is considered highly reliable due to its direct source and the built-in trust established with customers through transparent data collection practices

choices.D: To provide trusted, first-party data in the Data Cloud Marketplace that follows all compliance regulations
choices.C: To obtain competitive data from reliable sources through interviews, surveys, and polls
choices.B: To provide transparency and security for data gathered from individuals who provide consent for its use and receive value in exchange

Data Explorer: This feature allows the consultant to explore and analyze the data to ensure it is accurate and properly unified.

Identity Resolution: This helps in matching and merging records to create a single, unified profile, ensuring the data is correctly integrated.

Profile Explorer: This feature provides a detailed view of the unified profile, making it easier to validate the data and ensure consistency across records.

These three features can be used to validate the data in the unified profile object. Data Explorer allows you to view the ingested data from different sources and how it is mapped to the unified profile object. Query API allows you to query the unified profile object using SOQL or SQL queries. Profile Explorer allows you to view the unified profile records and their attributes.
